roleset.name: to record or to navigate somewhere online
roleset.note: LOG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'log' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from log.01-v)

example.name: log-v: arbitrary subject
example.text: They worried about an Interior Department directive [*] to log all communications with Members or their staffs .
example.arg: all communications with Members or their staffs

example.name: log-v: passive
example.text: This means [0] [Interior contacts]-1 can not be logged [*-1] only on one day -- a Sunday that [*T*-2] had already passed .
example.arg: only on one day -- a Sunday that [*T*-2] had already passed

example.name: log-v: transitive
example.text: Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. , the entity formed [*] from the recent acquisition of Squibb Corp. by Bristol-Myers Co. , logged the largest volume decline , 7,592,988 shares , to 12,017,724 .
example.arg: Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. , the entity formed [*] from the recent acquisition of Squibb Corp. by Bristol-Myers Co. ,
the largest volume decline , 7,592,988 shares , to 12,017,724

roleset.name: do the job of cutting trees into logs
roleset.note: LOG-V NOTES: This frame was based on Verbnet classes 13.7 and 35.1. Frameset created by Jena (from log.03-v)

example.name: log-v
example.text: The ban on * logging natural forests has not protected ...

example.name: do_logging-l
example.text: From there he came to Gilroy in the spring of 1868, and contracted with [William Hanna]-1 *PRO*-1 to do his logging.

roleset.name: to enter into a computer the information required to begin a session

example.name: log_on-v: intransitive
example.text: If it finds one and gets into the system , it will display a screen [*ICH*-1] when a user logs on [*T*-3]that [*T*-2] says , `` Worms Against Nuclear Killers ... .

roleset.name: Exit a computer system
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparson with log_on. No VN or FN classess. Framed by Katie.

example.name: log_off-v: Both args
example.text: Oh, but I just logged off email!

roleset.name: enter a secured computer system
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison with log_on. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: log_in-v: both args
example.text: When you log in to Facebook, you'll see the message.

roleset.name: Exit a computer system
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparson with log_out. No VN or FN classess. Framed by Katie.

example.name: log_out-v: both args
example.text: After you read his message, PRO log out of email.
